languages.text: "Я долж{mf|ен|на} сознаться. Я обнаружил{mf||а} некий хаос-артефакт в когитаторе обители и с{mf|чел|очла} необходимым избавиться от него".

traits.locale_text: "Я долж{mf|ен|на} сознаться. Я обнаружил{mf||а} некий хаос-артефакт в когитаторе обители и с{mf|чел|очла} необходимым избавиться от него".

languages.text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."
languages.original_text: "Я долж{mf|ен|на} сознаться. Я обнаружил{mf||а} некий хаос-артефакт в когитаторе обители и с{mf|чел|очла} необходимым избавиться от него".

traits.locale_text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."
"I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."
"I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."
"I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."

languages.text: “我有件事情要向你坦白。当时，我在那个修会的沉思者中发现了某种混沌造物，我认为我必须把它消灭掉。”
languages.original_text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."

traits.locale_text: “我有件事情要向你坦白。当时，我在那个修会的思考器中发现了某种混沌造物，我认为我必须把它消灭掉。”

languages.text: «Debo confesar algo. Encontré una especie de artefacto del Caos en el cogitador del cenobium y consideré necesario deshacerme de él».
languages.original_text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."

traits.locale_text: «Debo confesar algo. Encontré una especie de artefacto del Caos en el cogitador del cenobium y consideré necesario deshacerme de él».

languages.text: 「伝えておきたいことがある。セノビアムの考算機で、渾沌のアーティファクトの一種を発見したんだ。そして、私はそれを処分せねばならないと考えた」
languages.original_text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."

traits.locale_text: 「伝えておきたいことがある。セノビアムの考算機で、渾沌のアーティファクトの一種を発見したんだ。そして、私はそれを処分せねばならないと考えた」

languages.text: « J'ai quelque chose à vous avouer. J'ai découvert ce qui semble être un artefact du Chaos dans le cogitateur du Cenobium et j'ai jugé bon de m'en débarrasser. »
languages.original_text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai quelque chose à vous avouer. J'ai découvert ce qui semble être un artefact du Chaos dans le cogitateur du Cenobium et j'ai jugé bon de m'en débarrasser. »

languages.text: "Ich muss Euch etwas gestehen. Ich habe im Cogitator des Cenobiums etwas entdeckt, das mich an ein Chaos-Artefakt erinnert, und ich empfand es als notwendig, es zu entsorgen."
languages.original_text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euch etwas gestehen. Ich habe im Cogitator des Cenobiums etwas entdeckt, das mich an ein Chaos-Artefakt erinnert, und ich empfand es als notwendig, es zu entsorgen."

languages.text: "İtiraf etmem gereken bir şey var. Senobiyum'un kavramsayarında bir tür Kaos eseri keşfettim ve ondan kurtulmam gerektiğine karar verdim."
languages.original_text: "I have something to confess. I discovered some kind of Chaos artefact in the Cenobium's cogitator, and I deemed it necessary to dispose of it."
